text:
Looking for opportunities in marketing & public relations? We have handpicked 10 jobs for you this week. Click on the links below and apply away!
Recruiting and keen to list your jobs in future articles? Click here to create your company profile and post jobs. We feature jobs based on the following criteria:
Activity of recruiters on the platform. Recruiters who actively post new jobs, remove old ones, and accept/reject applicants will have higher chances of being featured. Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. Marketing Intern at CybrHome 
CybrHome is the fastest way to explore the internet. Using CybrHome, one can find out top websites, blogs, apps and more for any given purpose, topic or category.
Work location: Bangalore, India / Full-time Requirement: A keen interest in marketing and all things digital, strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking, understanding of SEO/SEM, Digital Advertisements, Analytics, Skills: SEO/SEM, social media, A/B testing. More jobs at CybrHome 
Digital Marketing Internship at Kredivest 
Kredivest is fintech peer to peer lending that aims to get your unpaid invoices paid in advance
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia / Internship Requirement: Comfortable with the use of social media, a good understanding of social media marketing strategy, strong passion about being a user/provider of social content. Skills: Digital marketing, digital media, digital strategy. Equity: Yes More jobs at Kredivest 
Product Marketing Manager at Seeties 
Seeties allows people to discover the best things happening in their cities and around Southeast Asia. Seeties’s mission is to make city life happy and meaningful, and we aspire to bring joy to millions of lives.
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia / Full-time Requirement: 3+ years of product marketing experience, has experience with both B2C and B2B audiences, good knowledge of digital marketing, willing to travel Skills: Product marketing, community management, digital marketing. Salary Range: MYR 6,000 – 8,000 More jobs at Seeties 
Platform Growth at Lynk Global 
Lynk Global is a platform dedicated to connecting people to the right experts for advice, insights, and knowledge. Bridging the gap of knowledge, one lynk at a time.
Work location: Hong Kong / Full-time Requirement: 3-5 years of functionally relevant work experience in a role requiring critical analytical thinking, results oriented and highly motivated self-starters with high attention to detail. Skills: Writing, leadership, communication skills. Salary Range: IDR 1,000,000 – 2,000,000 More jobs at Lynk Global 
Digital Marketing Professional at BMAsia Limited 
BMAsia is a recognized provider of background music across Asia regions and from the Middle East to the Indian Ocean Islands.
Work location: Bangkok, Thailand / Full-time Requirement: Male or Females of any nationality living in Thailand, working experience in digital marketing digital platforms & system, social media, customer portal, etc. for a minimum of 3 years. Skills: Analytics & reporting, digital marketing, digital strategy, data analysis. Salary Range: THB 25,000 – 50,000 More jobs at BMAsia Limited 
Senior Marketing Research Analyst at Swiftcow 
Swiftcow is a personal shopping and delivery service where you can shop from one of all of you favorite supermarkets and get your shopping in one delivery.
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia / Full-time Requirement: 2+ years experience in any business/marketing research role, passion for research & understanding, familiarity with retail metrics (preferred, not required). Skills: Research, Google Analytics, marketing. Equity: Yes More jobs at Swiftcow 
Intern – Market Research Analyst at Shentilium Technologies 
Shentilium Technologies uses big data analytics, machine learning, and cutting-edge database technologies to discover actionable information from your data.
Work location: Singapore / Full-time Requirement: Currently pursuing a diploma or degree in Business, Management, Finance or other related fields, good communication skills, proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Skills: Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel. Salary Range: SGD 800 – 1,000 More jobs at Shentilium Technologies 
Content/ Marketing Analyst at OKLink 
OKLink is more than a blockchain settlement company. OKLink is striving to change the world’s financial economy.
Work location: Hong Kong / Full-time Requirement: Experience in developing content and managing social media platforms, has copywriting experience in PR, Social Media Feeds (Facebook, Instagram) or blogging experience. Skills: Copywriting & editing, PR, social media. Salary Range: HKD 20,000 – 40,000 More jobs at OKLink 
Marketing Internship at The Wedge Asia 
The Wedge Asia is a leading platform that brings conscious people from around the world together to connect, find inspiration, gain knowledge, and take action to co-create a better future.
Work location: Singapore / Internship Requirement: Loves putting their thinking cap on, learning hands-on skills and (sometimes) has quick feet, ability to develop social media campaigns and management. Skills: Social media marketing, client relations, brand management. Salary Range: SGD 3,500 – 5,500 More jobs at The Wedge Asia 
Marketing at HelloReporter 
HelloReporter helps the reporter to find qualified news source & helps startup domain expert to get media exposure.
Work location: Hong Kong / Full-time Requirement: Experience: 1 – 2 years of PR / Media / Content experience, excellent English & Chinese, copywriting & writing skill, willing to use various technology & tools to work efficiently. Skills: Social media marketing, writing, Cantonese language. More jobs at HelloReporter
